summary: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.
cast: Cillian Murphy|Morgan Jones|Eva Birthistle|Liam Neeson|Mary Coughlan|Conor McEvoy|Ruth McCabe|Charlene McKenna|Seamus Reilly|Peter Owens|Emmet Lawlor McHugh|Bianca O'Connor|Paraic Breathnach|Pat McCabe|Owen Roe|Ruth Negga|Rynagh O'Grady|Laurence Kinlan|Steve Blount|Keith McCoy|Liam Cunningham|Liam O'Toole|Peter Halpin|Peter Gowen|Mark Doherty|Gavin Friday|Tony Devlin|Kieran Lally|Stephen McDaid|Pete Reddy|Maurice Seezer|Lex Shrapnel|Eamonn Owens|Ciaran Nolan|Mary Ryan|Kathryn Pogson|Alan Moloney|Derek Elroy|Brendan Gleeson|Mal White|Paul O'Toole|Antonia Campbell-Hughes|Janet Moran|Bryan Ferry|Stephen Rea|Andy Moore|Marc O'Shea|Rachel Donovan|Neil Jackson|Dominic Cooper|Alan Heyburn|Ian Hart|Steven Waddington|James Greene|Fiona Clarke|Gillian Johnson|Chris McHallem|Sid Young|Britta Smith|Doreen Keogh|Catherine Dunne|Tom Hickey|Mark Lambert|Sarah Manson|Morne Botes|Jot Maxi|Chris Robinson
title: Desayuno en Plutón
